mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM tbl_board ORDER BY bno desc, regdate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board ( bno, title, content, writer ) VALUES ( (SELECT ifnull(MAX(bno)+1, 1)FROM tbl_board tb), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
